es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.itemnovelty.reranking

Class ItemNoveltyReranker<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.reranking.PermutationReranker<U,I>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.itemnovelty.reranking.ItemNoveltyReranker<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reranker<U,I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FDItemNoveltyReranker, ISDCItemNoveltyReranker, PCItemNoveltyReranker, PDItemNoveltyReranker, TDItemNoveltyReranker

    public class ItemNoveltyReranker<U,I>
extends PermutationReranker<U,I>
    Item Novelty re-ranker. It re-ranks the output of a recommendation by re-scoring through a linear combination of the relevance scores and the output of a ItemNovelty. S. Vargas. Novelty and diversity evaluation and enhancement in Recommender Systems. PhD Thesis.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

      • value

        protected double value(IdDouble<I> iv,
                       Stats relStats,
                       it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2DoubleMap<I> novMap,
                       Stats novStats)
        Re-scored value to determine the re-ranking.
        Parameters:
        iv - item-relevance pair from the input recommendation
        relStats - statistics about the relevance scores
        novMap - item-novelty pairs
